info.title: Insurance Claims Automation API
info.description: APIs for managing insurance claims by pulling list of open claims, identifying outstanding paperwork for each claim, identifying all claim details, and sending reminders to policy holders.

get.summary: Gets the list of all open insurance claims
get.description: Gets the list of all open insurance claims. Returns all claimIds that are open.

200.description: Gets the list of all open insurance claims for policy holders

policyHolderId.description: Unique ID of the policy holder who has filed the claim.

claimStatus.description: The status of the claim. Claim can be in Open or Closed state.

get.summary: Gets outstanding paperwork for a specific claim
get.description: Gets the list of pending documents that needs to be uploaded by the policy holder before the claim can be processed. The API takes in only one claim id and returns the list of documents that are pending to be uploaded. This API should be called for each claim id.

parameters.name: claimId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the open insurance claim

200.description: List of documents that are pending to be uploaded by policy holder for insurance claim

pendingDocuments.description: The list of pending documents for the claim.

get.summary: Gets all details about a specific claim
get.description: Gets all details about a specific claim given a claim id.

parameters.name: claimId
parameters.description: Unique ID of the open insurance claim

status.description: Claim status. One of: Open, Completed.

policyType.description: Policy type. One of: Vehicle, Life, Disability.

post.summary: API to send reminder to the policy holder about pending documents for the open claim
post.description: Send reminder to the policy holder about pending documents for the open claim. The API takes in only one claim id and its pending documents at a time, sends the reminder and returns the tracking details for the reminder. This API should be called for each claim id you want to send reminders.

claimId.description: Unique ID of open claims to send reminders.

pendingDocument.description: name of the pending document in the claim

DocumentRequirements.description: the requirements of the pending document in the claim

pendingDocuments.description: List of object containing the pending documents id as key and their requirements as value

sendReminderTrackingId.description: Unique Id to track the status of the send reminder call

400.description: Bad request. One or more required fields are missing or invalid.
